resources.string: Bloquear chamadas e mensagens deste número?
Faça cópia dos seus contactos para a sua Conta Xiaomi para aceder aos mesmos em qualquer lugar!
Alterar o contacto seleccionado? As informações que inseriu até agora vão ser copiadas

"%1$d. Ligue o Bluetooth no outro dispositivo.
- O Bluetooth pode ser encontrado nas definições de rede nos dispositivos Android. - Nos dispositivos iOS, o Bluetooth está nas Definições.
%2$d. O modo Vísivel também deve estar ligado nos dispositivos Android.
%3$d. Toque \"Seguinte\" e dê aos Contactos as permissões necessárias"
A Xiaomi Cloud quer eliminar alguns dos seus contactos. Eliminar agora?

"Os contactos estão em processo de actualização.
O processo de actualização requer aproximadamente %sMB de armazenamento interno.
Escolher uma das seguintes opções:"

O pedido de importação do vCard foi rejeitado. Tente mais tarde
O ficheiro vai ser importado em breve

"If you continue, you'll cancel Mi Carrier Services. After that, we'll stop collecting and using your personal information and delete your order history permanently. Make sure all your transactions are completed before you cancel services."
"Couldn't use %1$s. Install the corresponding app first."
Delete the recently used phone number
Wait a minute or two and try again.
Edit tag for the saved number

Welcome to Mi Carrier Services! You can use this app to check your phone balance, purchase call minutes and mobile data, and more. This app needs to connect to the network to be able to work normally.
Checked successfully. The info might be updated with a delay here.
To be able to cancel services, sign in first.
To be able to withdraw consent, sign in first.
Turn on Mi Carrier Services to be able to use this feature.
This permission allows displaying call duration
This permission allows access to phone numbers in contacts
Allow Mi Carrier Services to connect to the internet and grant the required permissions before using the app.
"Couldn't connect to the network. Go back and complete payment again."
Your balance might be credited with a delay
Allow Mi Carrier Services to access your contacts first.
For displaying contacts during topping up
For topping up balance of your contacts
For placing orders and checking their status
Read call log for displaying call duration
Read contacts for topping up balance of your contacts
For displaying phone numbers and related carrier info
"Can't view details due to carrier restrictions"
To top up, add a phone number first.
Add mobile data included in your plan
Set your plan to be able to check your balance.
Save this number to use it for the next top-up
Sign in to Mi Account to be able to purchase call minutes and mobile data
This number is similar to %1$s. Top up this number anyway?
"You won't be able to manage your carrier plan or purchase data and call minutes if you turn off Mi Carrier Services. Turn off anyway?"
Allow us to analyze your traffic and recommend digital products based on the results
"Couldn't find an app to handle this action"
You can always turn Mi Carrier Services back on in Contacts > Settings.
Wait a minute or two and try again.
Withdrawal of consent and service cancelation
Withdraw consent to the Privacy Policy of Mi Carrier Services

"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Mi Carrier Services. After that, we'll stop collecting and using your personal information and delete your order history permanently. Make sure all your transactions are completed before you withdraw consent."
"To protect your privacy, audio recordings of your calls along with transcribed text will be encrypted and stored on your device locally. Other apps won't be able to access these items."
Protect call recordings with an additional password

string.name: cta_content_seg1
string.Data: "Important notice By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing to Mi Account Service Agreement, Mi Roaming User Agreement, and Privacy Policy. Read these documents carefully and fully understand all the related terms and conditions before you agree."

resources.string: " Mi Roaming needs to connect to the internet and access your location info to work normally. Additionally, Mi Roaming may collect, use, and share your personal information. Your personal information will be protected in accordance with the local laws and regulations."

"%1$d. Save the contacts from the other device on the SIM card;
%2$d. Open settings in the Contacts app, and then go to \"Import/Export contacts\" -- \"Import from SIM card\", hold any SIM contact to select it, select all the required contacts, and tap \"Import\"."
Install Mi Pay to complete payment.
Turn on Caller ID to identify spam calls
Sync with the cloud is off

"Contacts permissions were updated. Allow Contacts to access call recordings.
How to grant permission Tap \"%1$s\", and then select \"%2$s\"."
"Android doesn't allow Contacts and Phone to access call recordings by default. Allow these apps to access call recordings to be able to view them."
Allow Contacts and Phone to access call recordings
Permitir que esta funcionalidade se ligue a dispositivos próximos via Bluetooth para poder importar contactos de outros dispositivos
Não é possível mostrar códigos QR em ecrã dividido
